hero.pill: Games and apps that respect your time
hero.lead1: Compact, replayable games. Frictionless utility apps.

app-ecopulse.tagline: Shared accounts, recurring expenses, and income — everything clear in one dashboard.
app-ecopulse.description: Simple personal and shared finance management: joint accounts, recurring expenses, income, and notes per transaction.
app-ecopulse.longDescription: EcoPulse helps you keep full control of your day-to-day finances. You can create shared accounts to track joint money (both cash and card) and save the reason for each expense so you always remember what it was for. You can also log recurring monthly expenses (subscriptions, rent, bills), add income, and view your balance clearly to make better decisions.

features.0: Shared accounts for joint money (cash and card).
features.1: Expense reason and quick notes for every transaction.
features.4: Visual summaries by period and category to spot patterns.

app-habit-tracker.tagline: Simple routines and clear stats to keep you on track.
app-habit-tracker.description: Simple routines, gentle reminders, and clear stats to maintain your momentum.
app-habit-tracker.longDescription: Habit Tracker helps you build consistency with a fast, simple flow: create habits, check in daily, and review your streaks without friction. It includes optional reminders and easy-to-understand metrics so you can improve week by week.

features.0: Quick habit creation with daily or weekly goals.
features.1: Streaks and visual progress with a calendar view.
features.3: Simple stats to track growth and consistency.
features.4: Tags and notes to personalize each habit.

app-aura-mood-tracker.tagline: Track your mood and uncover patterns with weekly insights.
app-aura-mood-tracker.description: Mood tracking with insights: patterns, quick notes, and weekly trends.
app-aura-mood-tracker.longDescription: Aura Mood Tracker lets you log your mood in seconds, add notes, and spot trends with weekly summaries. Ideal for understanding patterns, identifying triggers, and improving your wellbeing with simple, private data.

features.0: Fast mood logging with customizable levels.
features.1: Notes and tags for context (sleep, stress, events…).
features.3: Search by date and filtering by tags.
features.4: Privacy by design (your data stays yours).

game-akaladrom.description: Open-world multiplayer RPG: explore, level up, and play with friends in shared sessions.
game-akaladrom.tagline: Explore a living world with your friends.
game-akaladrom.longDescription: Akaladrom is an open-world multiplayer RPG where exploration, progression and cooperation are at the core. Travel across vast biomes, complete quests, defeat powerful enemies and upgrade your build to fit your playstyle. Jump into shared sessions with friends, take on challenging encounters together, and uncover secrets hidden throughout the world.

features.0: Open-world exploration with diverse biomes and points of interest.
features.1: Multiplayer shared sessions to play and progress with friends.
features.2: Character progression with levels, upgrades and build choices.
features.3: Questing and challenges with bosses, events and rewards.
features.4: Loot and customization to adapt your style of combat and traversal.
